mapper.select: SELECT t.ms_id, t.enum_id, t.ms_class, t.er_source, CASE WHEN t.enum_id = 16 AND t.min_val = t.ms_1 THEN '1' WHEN t.enum_id = 16 AND t.min_val = t.ms_2 THEN '2' WHEN t.enum_id = 16 AND t.min_val = t.ms_3 THEN '3' WHEN t.enum_id = 15 AND t.min_val = t.ms_1 THEN '4' WHEN t.enum_id = 15 AND t.min_val = t.ms_2 THEN '5' WHEN t.enum_id = 15 AND t.min_val = t.ms_3 THEN '6' END pc_id FROM ( SELECT a_mark_sheet.ms_id, class_register.enum_id, ms_1, ms_2, ms_3, ms_class, er_source, LEAST(ms_1, ms_2, ms_3) AS min_val FROM a_mark_sheet LEFT JOIN a_exercise_task ON a_mark_sheet.et_id = a_exercise_task.et_id LEFT JOIN class_register ON a_exercise_task.cr_id = class_register.cr_id LEFT JOIN a_exercise_resource ON a_mark_sheet.ms_id = a_exercise_resource.ms_id WHERE a_mark_sheet.ms_id = #{msId} AND a_exercise_task.enum_id = #{enumId} ) t;
